name: Miniature Cheesecakes
author: SUZANM
summary: This makes 24 mini cheesecakes baked in muffin cups with a vanilla wafer for the crust. These easy do-ahead desserts are perfect for a party. Keep a batch in your freezer and top with the cherry pie filling just before serving.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Line 24 muffin cups with paper or foil baking liners
Place one vanilla wafer in each cup
In large bowl, beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the nutmeg and vanilla
Pour mixture evenly into prepared muffin cups, filling each 2/3 full
Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes or until set
Cool completely, then top with cherry pie filling
Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve
